name: Solrock

passive.name: Sunlight
passive.effect: Once per turn, when you must discard a Fire Energy, you may return it to your hand instead. If you have a Lunatone in play, it can be an Energy of any type instead.

attacks.name: Solar Rays
attacks.effect: Attach a Fire Energy to one of your Pokemon. If you have a Lunatone in play, it can be an Energy of any type instead.

attacks.name: Magma Blast
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon to use this attack.

flavor: Sun fans rejoice - here's a rock for you!
